reviewText: My 5 year old saw this show on youtube and became obsessed with it. I was really happy to find that there were dvd copies available, especially since I had never heard of the show. I love it, the lessons really stick with my kids and I approve. Packaged securely and arrived on time.

I purchased two DVD's for my grandson.  He saw the show on TV and liked it.  He was thrilled that I was able to get him his own DVD so he can watch it anytime.  I was very pleased to receive the DVD's so quickly.
